statements: DELETE FROM bootcamp_students WHERE student_name = 'Alice' AND course_enrolled = 'Data Science';
DELETE FROM bootcamp_students WHERE student_name = 'Alice' AND student_age > 25;
DELETE FROM bootcamp_courses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM bootcamp_courses WHERE course_id IN (SELECT course_id FROM bootcamp_courses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM bootcamp_enrollments WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 1;
DELETE FROM bootcamp_courses WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM bootcamp_grades WHERE student_id = '2f56b3f9-8484-470a-8f17-ffc29b508510' AND assignment_id = 'ee730619-4727-49d0-8457-4129e4e92033';
